      • transformViewPort

        public static java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transformViewPort(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform initial,
                                              TEMViewState temviewState)
        calculates a AffineTransform of the viewPort rotation/pan/zoom state based on the initial AffineTransform state and the TEMViewState associated to the TEMView.
        Parameters:
        initial - - initial AffineTransform state of the temView
        temviewState -
        Returns:
        viewPortTransform - the AffineTransform obtained by the transformations related to zooming, panning and scaling of the TEMView.
